name: A reactive mixture of ethylene acrylic acid copolymer (EAA; CAS Reg. No. 9010-77-9) and N,N,N',N'-tetrakis(2-hydroxypropyl)adipamide (HAA; CAS Reg. No. 57843-53-5).
